title: S16 Ep122: Supernatural News/Parashare: Horror or Hype Edition
itunes:title: Supernatural News/Parashare: Horror or Hype Edition
description:
Darkness Radio presents Supernatural News/ParaShare: Horror or Hype Edition

Dave & Tim amble through the pumpkin patches of the paranormal to deliver you strange stories from around the world.This week we dissect Hollywood Horror and discuss the new Chucky Series, Day of the Dead series, Rob Zombie's foray into the "Horror" realm and upcoming strike at The Munsters movie he is creating. 

We also turn to our furry friends to determine, Do Dogs Really See Ghosts? Spirited Spirits are being released in time for Halloween, tales of terror from Texas that may or may not live up to their claims, PLUS YOUR emails, stories, questions and ponderings. 

Check out the news section of our site to see the stories we discuss here: https://www.darknessradio.com/news
itunes:author: Darkness Radio
dc:creator: Darkness Radio
